= Introduction

= Methods
We follow the glacier melting models established in @harry.


The equation $ Q = rho A v + "time offset" $ defines the glacial flow rate.

Total displaced soil by glacial flow:

$ 
  7.32 beta + sum_(i=0)^nabla (Q_i (a_i - epsilon)) / 2 
$

$
  v := vec(x_1, x_2, x_3)
